summary: Today I focused heavily on refactoring the authentication module and researching PostgreSQL optimization techniques. I successfully implemented the new login flow and verified it with unit tests.
activities: Refactored the API authentication module in `auth.py`
Reviewed GitHub PR #42 for my-local-llm project
Read documentation about Graph Databases at neo4j.com
Updated project README.md with new setup instructions
learnings: I learned that PostgreSQL B-tree indexes work efficiently with JSONB columns using GIN indexes
The Orchestrator pattern helps decouple authentication logic from business logic
facts: Fixed: Login Bug in OAuth flow
